title: How to Watch Videos on YouTube

steps.title: Open your "App Store" app.
steps.content: Open your "App Store" app.

steps.title: Tap Search.
steps.content: Tap Search . This is the magnifying glass icon on the bottom of your screen.

steps.title: Type in "youtube".
steps.content: Type in "youtube".

steps.title: Tap "youtube".
steps.content: Tap "youtube". It should be the first result in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap "YouTube".
steps.content: Tap "YouTube".

steps.title: Tap GET.
steps.content: Tap GET . This is in the top right corner of your screen. If you've downloaded YouTube before, this will be a cloud icon with an arrow facing down.

steps.title: Tap INSTALL.
steps.content: Tap INSTALL .

steps.title: Enter your Apple ID and password if prompted.
steps.content: Enter your Apple ID and password if prompted.

steps.title: Wait for YouTube to finish downloading.
steps.content: Wait for YouTube to finish downloading.

steps.title: Open the "YouTube" app.
steps.content: Open the "YouTube" app.

steps.title: Tap the magnifying glass.
steps.content: Tap the magnifying glass. This is in the top right corner of your phone screen.

steps.title: Type in a search query.
steps.content: Type in a search query.

steps.title: Tap Search.
steps.content: Tap Search .

steps.title: Tap a video you want to watch.
steps.content: Tap a video you want to watch. It should start automatically! Tap anywhere on the video to pause it. Click again to un-pause.

steps.title: Tap the Share button.
steps.content: Tap the Share button. This is the right-facing arrow below your video.

steps.title: Tap a sharing option.
steps.content: Tap a sharing option. Your options are: Copy link Share on Facebook Share on Gmail Share on Twitter Share through email Share in a message Share through WhatsApp More (share through your phone's messaging app}

steps.title: Follow your option's provided steps.
steps.content: Follow your option's provided steps. You have successfully viewed and shared a YouTube video!

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store.
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store.

steps.title: Tap the search bar.
steps.content: Tap the search bar.

steps.title: Type in "youtube".
steps.content: Type in "youtube".

steps.title: Tap Go.
steps.content: Tap Go .

steps.title: Tap "YouTube".
steps.content: Tap "YouTube".

steps.title: Tap Install.
steps.content: Tap Install .

steps.title: Tap Accept if prompted.
steps.content: Tap Accept if prompted.

steps.title: Wait for YouTube to finish downloading.
steps.content: Wait for YouTube to finish downloading.

steps.title: Tap your "YouTube" app.
steps.content: Tap your "YouTube" app.

steps.title: Tap the magnifying glass.
steps.content: Tap the magnifying glass. This is in the top right corner of your phone screen.

steps.title: Type in a search query.
steps.content: Type in a search query.

steps.title: Tap Search.
steps.content: Tap Search .

steps.title: Tap a video you want to watch.
steps.content: Tap a video you want to watch. It should start automatically! Tap anywhere on the video to pause it. Click again to un-pause.

steps.title: Tap the Share button.
steps.content: Tap the Share button. This is the right-facing arrow at the top of your video window. [1] X Research source If you can't see this option, tap the video window once.

steps.title: Tap a sharing option.
steps.content: Tap a sharing option. Your options are: Copy link Share on Facebook Share on Gmail Share on Twitter Share through email Share in a message Share through WhatsApp More (share through your phone's messaging app}

steps.title: Follow your phone's on-screen steps.
steps.content: Follow your phone's on-screen steps. Now you know how to open and share a YouTube video on Android!

steps.title: Navigate to YouTube.
steps.content: Navigate to YouTube .

steps.title: Click the "Search" field.
steps.content: Click the "Search" field. This is at the top of the page.

steps.title: Type in a search query.
steps.content: Type in a search query.

steps.title: Press ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Press ↵ Enter . You can also click the magnifying glass icon to the right of this search bar.

steps.title: Click on a video you'd like to watch.
steps.content: Click on a video you'd like to watch. Now you know how to watch a YouTube video! To pause the video, click anywhere on the video's display. Click again to un-pause.

steps.title: Click the Share arrow.
steps.content: Click the Share arrow. This is below your YouTube video.

steps.title: Right-click the highlighted URL.
steps.content: Right-click the highlighted URL. You can also click one of the provided social media platforms.

steps.title: Click Copy.
steps.content: Click Copy .

steps.title: Paste your YouTube link onto your preferred site.
steps.content: Paste your YouTube link onto your preferred site. Do this by right-clicking in a shareable field (e.g., an email or a status update field) and clicking Paste .

steps.title: Return to your video.
steps.content: Return to your video. You have now viewed and shared a YouTube video!
